name: ThunderTale (jetsontwo)
description:
Created By:

Andrew Smith - Production, Programming

Tyler Witten - Programming, Sound Designer

Tiffany Kong - Artist

Paiam Moghaddam - Designer, Tester

Survive as long as you can in the Thunderdome from the onslaught of colorful creatures as every aspect ramps up through every kill.

How To Play: WASD  to navigate player and Mouse to aim and fire at enemies

Source code available at https://github.com/turtlewit/Rostam
